alert.note: Alert for Nowata (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 1:57PM CDT until May 07 at 3:18AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Verdigris River near Lenapah affecting Nowata County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Verdigris River near Lenapah. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, moderate flooding affects mainly farmland and rural roads. State Highway 10 is threatened by high water at a point 5 miles east of Lenapah. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 31.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
